scripts.dev: node scripts/update.js && pnpm copy-workers && svelte-kit dev
scripts.build: node scripts/update.js && pnpm copy-workers && svelte-kit build
scripts.prebuild: test "$CI" = true && rm -rf src/content && git clone https://github.com/sveltejs/kit src/content && npx pnpm install --store=node_modules/.pnpm-store || echo skipping pnpm install
scripts.postbuild: test "$CI" = true && rm -rf .netlify/functions/render/content && mkdir -p .netlify/functions/render/content && cp -r src/content/documentation .netlify/functions/render/content
